item.title: Raspberry Pi SpinKube livestream
item.author: radu@matei.ai (Radu Matei)
item.description: I recently built a 5-node Raspberry Pi cluster running Wasm workloads using the new SpinKube project. Here is a picture taken by Matt (in my kitchen), right before KubeCon: Doing a little bit of pre #KubeCon scale testing for the booth demo.@SpinKube on a Pi cluster. Come by the @fermyontech booth this week to see what weâ€™re up to.#kubernetes #k3s #webassembly pic.twitter.com/2vErSmEj7A — Matt Butcher @FermyonTech (@technosophos) March 17, 2024 This week, I joined Fermyon’s weekly live stream together with Sohan to talk about the cluster and demonstrate running Wasm workloads.
